$comment: This file contains manually researched factory vetting hints for different product categories. During alpha, we maintain these as versioned JSON files. Each entry should be researched using external tools (Perplexity, GPT, etc.) and follow the same structure. Rename this file to category_vetting.json after adding your first real entries.

categories.label: Baby Teether / Infant Teething Toys
typicalSupplierTypes: ODM (Original Design Manufacturer) with toy safety expertise
sampleQuestionsToFactory: Do you have CPSIA-compliant testing documentation from a CPSC-accepted lab?
What grade of silicone do you use? Can you provide a certificate of analysis (COA)?
Have you manufactured baby products before? Can you share case studies or references?
What is your process for ensuring no small parts break off during testing?
Do you have a quality control process for phthalates and heavy metals?
Can you provide a sample and full testing report before production?
commonRedFlags: Factory cannot provide recent third-party test reports
Factory has never manufactured children's products before
Unusually low pricing (may indicate cutting corners on materials)
Cannot provide material certificates or COAs
Factory refuses to sign a quality agreement or warranty
No clear process for handling product recalls
recommendedAlibabaFilters: Factory location: Guangdong, Zhejiang (have more experience with export regulations)

categories.label: Stainless Steel Tumbler / Water Bottle
typicalSupplierTypes: ODM with experience in food-grade products
Factories with vacuum flask manufacturing capability
mustHaveCertificates: BSCI or equivalent social compliance audit
sampleQuestionsToFactory: What grade of stainless steel do you use? Can you provide a material certificate?
Do you have FDA food contact testing documentation?
Can you provide a sample with your logo and test it for lead/cadmium migration?
What is your minimum order quantity (MOQ) and lead time?
Do you have experience exporting to [target market]? Any compliance issues in the past?
Can you provide references from other brands you've worked with?
What is your process for ensuring vacuum seal integrity?
commonRedFlags: Cannot specify stainless steel grade (should be 304 or 316)
Unusually cheap pricing (may indicate lower-grade materials)
Cannot provide leak-proof or vacuum seal testing reports
No clear process for handling defects or returns
recommendedAlibabaFilters: Product categories: Kitchen, Dining & Bar, Vacuum Flasks & Thermoses
